Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Potion = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local myRightLeg local myLeftLeg
local torsoFrames = {}
local attackGyro local bodyPosition
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local damage = 15
local attackAnim local attackType = 0
Tool.Enabled = true
function changeAttack(key) if key then key = key:lower() if key == "q" then attackType = 1 elseif key == "e" then attackType = 2 elseif key == "r" then attackType = 3 end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil and player ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end
function flashKick() local lookVector attackAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("FlashKickAnim")) if attackAnim then attackAnim:Play() end if myTorso then myRightLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") myLeftLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") if myRightLeg and myLeftLeg then torsoFrames = {} attackGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") attackGyro.P = 50000 attackGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(attackGyro.P, attackGyro.P, attackGyro.P)
torsoFrames[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(1*math.pi/3, 0, 0) torsoFrames[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(2*math.pi/3, 0, 0) torsoFrames[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, 0) torsoFrames[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(4*math.pi/3, 0, 0) torsoFrames[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(5*math.pi/3, 0, 0) torsoFrames[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") bodyPosition.P = 100000 bodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(50000, 50000, 50000) bodyPosition.position = myTorso.Position bodyPosition.Parent = myTorso
attackGyro.Parent = myTorso lookVector = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector
rightLegConnection = myRightLeg.Touched:connect(blow) leftLegConnection = myLeftLeg.Touched:connect(blow) for i = 1, 48 do local c = i%6 + 1 if attackGyro then attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[c] end if bodyPosition then bodyPosition.position = myTorso.Position + lookVector * 1.0 + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 1.0 end wait(0.08) end attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[6] if bodyPosition then bodyPosition:Remove() end if rightLegConnection then rightLegConnection:disconnect() end if leftLegConnection then leftLegConnection:disconnect() end wait(0.4) if attackGyro then attackGyro:Remove() end end end end
function chargeKick() print(2.1) attackAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("ChargeKickAnim")) if attackAnim == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end attackAnim:Play() local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint myHumanoid.Jump = true local direction = (target - myTorso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) myRightLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") myLeftLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") if myRightLeg == nil or myLeftLeg == nil then return end damage = 25 rightLegConnection = myRightLeg.Touched:connect(blow) leftLegConnection = myLeftLeg.Touched:connect(blow) if direction.magnitude > .01 then print(2.2) direction = direction.unit chargeBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") chargeBV.P = 100000 chargeBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(chargeBV.P, 0, chargeBV.P) chargeBV.velocity = direction * 50 chargeBV.Parent = myTorso myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(myTorso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, myTorso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(0.75) if rightLegConnection then rightLegConnection:disconnect() end if leftLegConnection then leftLegConnection:disconnect() end if chargeBV ~= nil then chargeBV:Remove() end wait(.5) damage = 15 end
function spinKick() if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end myLeftLeg = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") if myLeftLeg == nil then return end torsoFrames = {} spinKickAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SpinKickAnim) if spinKickAnim then spinKickAnim:Play() end
damage = 50
-- Here, we are creating different frames of reference for our character's -- torso, so that we can rotate him 360 degrees. 6 steps of 60 deg each torsoFrames[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrames[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrames[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoFrames[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrames[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrames[6] = myTorso.CFrame
-- Applying a force in the direction that we require on the body attackGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") attackGyro.P = 100000 attackGyro.D = 3000 attackGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(attackGyro.P, attackGyro.P, attackGyro.P) attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[1] attackGyro.Parent = myTorso wait(.4/3) attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[2] wait(.4/3) myHumanoid.Jump = true leftLegConnection = myLeftLeg.Touched:connect(blow) spinKickAnim:Play() attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[3] wait(.4/3) attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[4] wait(.4/3) attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[5] wait(.4/3) attackGyro.cframe = torsoFrames[6] wait(.4/3) if leftLegConnection then leftLegConnection:disconnect() leftLegConnection = nil end if attackGyro then attackGyro:Remove() end damage = 15 wait(.5) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if attackType == 0 then potionAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.PotionAnim) if potionAnim then potionAnim:Play() end ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 190 while myHumanoid.MaxHealth ~= 190 do print("1") myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 190 wait() end while myHumanoid.Health < ratio * myHumanoid.MaxHealth do myHumanoid.Health = ratio * myHumanoid.MaxHealth wait() end wait(1.0) attackType = 1 end Potion.Transparency = 1.0 if attackType == 1 then flashKick() elseif attackType == 2 then print(2) chargeKick() elseif attackType == 3 then spinKick() end
wait(3.0) Potion.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
mouse.KeyDown:connect(changeAttack) end end
function onUnequipped() attackType = 0 damage = 15 if attackAnim then attackAnim:Stop() end Potion.Transparency = 0.0 if attackGyro then attackGyro:Remove() end if bodyPosition then bodyPosition:Remove() end if rightLegConnection then rightLegConnection:disconnect() end if leftLegConnection then leftLegConnection:disconnect() end if chargeBV then chargeBV:Remove() end --if potionAnim then potionAnim:Stop() end print(myHumanoid, myHumanoid.MaxHealth) while myHumanoid.MaxHealth ~= 100 do myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 wait() end if myHumanoid then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end torsoFrames = {} end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
